Title: Poor Butterfly
Writer: Aída Bortnik, Raúl de la Torre
Actors: Graciela Borges, Lautaro Murúa, Pepe Soriano, Víctor Laplace
Plot: In May of 1945, the news of the fall of Berlin spread to Buenos Aires. Clara is the daughter of a socialist leader named Boris who has died unexpectedly. As Clara learns more about a father she hardly knew, she finds out slowly about his political involvement during the war. There is some unrest in Argentina, and soon, not even Clara's life is free from danger.
